description: The delivery of Aviation Replacement Parts is solicited by the Department of National Defence for the depot identified below.
full_summary:
**Request for Proposal - RFP W8485-237233/A: Aviation Replacement Parts**

**Overview:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting proposals for the supply and delivery of aviation replacement parts ( Batteries, Rechargeable) for various aircraft.

**Key Information:**

*   Reference Number: PW-22-01012275, Amendment Number: 1
*   Solicitation Number: W8485-237233/A
*   Publication Date: November 2, 2022
*   Tender Closing Date: November 30, 2022, 13:00:00 EST
*   Location for Delivery: 7 Canadian Forces Support Unit Edmonton, Free Carrier (FCA) at the Plant

**Detailed Requirements:**

DND is seeking to purchase the following items:

Item 1: Rechargeable SLAB Batteries (Gdark type: 6140-01-131-8104) for a quantity of 60 units 

*   Part Number: 0774-3005
*

Item 2: Rechargeable SLAB Batteries (Gdark type: 6140-01-131-8104) for a quantity of 60 units 

*   Part Number: 0774-3005
*

Item 3: Rechargeable SLAB Batteries (Gdark type: 6140-01-131-8104) for a quantity of 60 units 

*   Part Number: 0774-3005
*

Items 4, 5, and 6 are optional, with a quantity of up to 60 units 

*   Part Number: 0774-3005
*

**Delivery and Payment Terms:**

*   The Crown continues to retain the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
*   Documents may be submitted in either official language (English or French).

**Contact Information:**

*   Steve Duval-Urbain (pliant migrator), Steve.Duval-Urbain@forces.gc.ca, (999) 999-9999



Notice of Proposed Procurement - W8485-237233/A 
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the provision and supply of the item detailed below. The requirement is consistent with the description below.

Items: 

*   Part No.: 0774-3005,
*   NCAGE: 0WY95

Quantity: 60

Unit of issue: each

Delivery F.O.B.: plant
